channel.title: Npc following

item.title: Npc following
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:2, topic:448776”][quote author=I am Nick link=topic=551663.msg4041890#msg4041890 date=1341712432]
this is the npc chat

case 239: sendNpcChat1("Ok, I'll follow you GO!!!", c.talkingNpc, "Slave"); c.dialogueAction = 203; c.nextChat = 0; break;
and here is the dialogue action in clicking buttons

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 203) { Server.npcHandler.followPlayer(825, c.playerId); break;
but he doesn’t follow you help me get him to follow you rep++
[/quote]
I wish i knew myself ):[/quote]
Don’t post anything but help.

Read full topic
